Articles.Content:
For several days I have had a problem with blurring all things in ksp. I have not had a similar problem before. I tried to remove mods, reinstalling the game did not help. Has anyone had something similar and can help me with it?

My visual mods:

Environmental visual enhancements

Scatterer

Planet Shine

I used to use Parallax and Distant object enhancement

Examples:

On the Tantres Sojuz decoupler

On parachute lines
This looks like aliasing to me. It's a common feature in images with thin lines. Did you try increasing the "Anti-Aliasing" option in the graphics settings?

9 hours ago, HansAcker said:

This looks like aliasing to me. It's a common feature in images with thin lines. Did you try increasing the "Anti-Aliasing" option in the graphics settings?

I have 8x setting

3 hours ago, Kakub said:

I have 8x setting

This looks like a Planet Shine problem, i think i remember a similar thread.

I am not sure if it is connected but there is a stock bug called Shadows Flickering.

Usually Scatterer had a fix for it but lately i am seeing more and more posts about people with Scatterer that face this problem.

Here is the community fix, you might give it a try although it might not work anymore or some mods override it:

Changes in settings.cfg:

SHADOWS_FLIGHT_PROJECTION = 0
SHADOWS_KSC_PROJECTION = 0
SHADOWS_TRACKING_PROJECTION = 0
SHADOWS_EDITORS_PROJECTION = 0
SHADOWS_MAIN_PROJECTION = 0
SHADOWS_DEFAULT_PROJECTION = 0

To:

SHADOWS_FLIGHT_PROJECTION = 1
SHADOWS_KSC_PROJECTION = 1
SHADOWS_TRACKING_PROJECTION = 1
SHADOWS_EDITORS_PROJECTION = 1
SHADOWS_MAIN_PROJECTION = 1
SHADOWS_DEFAULT_PROJECTION = 1

6 hours ago, Serenity said:

This looks like a Planet Shine problem, i think i remember a similar thread.

I am not sure if it is connected but there is a stock bug called Shadows Flickering.

Usually Scatterer had a fix for it but lately i am seeing more and more posts about people with Scatterer that face this problem.

Here is the community fix, you might give it a try although it might not work anymore or some mods override it:

Changes in settings.cfg:

SHADOWS_FLIGHT_PROJECTION = 0
SHADOWS_KSC_PROJECTION = 0
SHADOWS_TRACKING_PROJECTION = 0
SHADOWS_EDITORS_PROJECTION = 0
SHADOWS_MAIN_PROJECTION = 0
SHADOWS_DEFAULT_PROJECTION = 0

To:

SHADOWS_FLIGHT_PROJECTION = 1
SHADOWS_KSC_PROJECTION = 1
SHADOWS_TRACKING_PROJECTION = 1
SHADOWS_EDITORS_PROJECTION = 1
SHADOWS_MAIN_PROJECTION = 1
SHADOWS_DEFAULT_PROJECTION = 1

 

Its not working  

But thanks anyway

If you’re running the latest version of scatterer, try downgrading to the previous version. I’ve had some issues with the newest scatterer including weird low-res shadows and other effects looking off, quite similar to what you’ve described, running in KSP 1.11.2 with EVE and scatterer (and Spectra rather than the default EVE configs), rolling back the scatterer version completely resolved it.

On 6/14/2021 at 12:08 PM, jimmymcgoochie said:

If you’re running the latest version of scatterer, try downgrading to the previous version. I’ve had some issues with the newest scatterer including weird low-res shadows and other effects looking off, quite similar to what you’ve described, running in KSP 1.11.2 with EVE and scatterer (and Spectra rather than the default EVE configs), rolling back the scatterer version completely resolved it.

It works !

Thank you so much !
